join_list.head: Technical Individuals
join_list.body: who are already working in the automobile maintenance, repairs & allied services, garages, services centers, spare parts vendors etc.

join_list.head: Non-Technical individuals
join_list.body: , who wish to make a career in the EV-industry.

join_list.head: Diploma & Graduate Engineers
join_list.body: , engaged in maintenance, design, service, etc. project managers, and other individuals seeking applied theoretical and practical knowledge and exposure and/or desirous of a career change into this new fast growing sector.

join_list.head: Commercial Individuals
join_list.body: , commerce graduates or persons from commercial backgrounds like accounts, marketing, sales, logistics can utilize their skills by upgrading their knowledge pertaining to the EV Industry and gain employment in their relevant departments.

join_list.head: Upgrade yourself technically:
join_list.body: Individuals engaged in automobile repair and allied services of internal combustion engines (Petrol & Diesel engines) can upgrade their existing skills and start catering to the Electric Vehicle(EV) industry.

join_list.head: EV Infrastructure Services:
join_list.body: Individuals with financial capacity to establish EV charging stations and battery swapping stations can acquire the required technical knowledge and skills for starting these services.

join_list.head: Minimum pre-requisites:
join_list.body: Basic Education (basic reading and writing). Physically able and ability to perform the practicals and pursue the course.
